snippet: The deal with the Moro Islamic Liberation Front, which has fought a war of independence for more than three decades, is expected to reduce the violence in the predominantly Muslim southern island of Mindanao.
abstract: Philippine government reaches peace deal with Moro Islamic Liberation Front, rebel group that has fought war of independence for more than three decades; deal is expected to reduce violence between Christian-dominated national government and predominately Muslim residents of the southern island of Mindanao.
lead_paragraph: The deal with the Moro Islamic Liberation Front, which has fought a war of independence for more than three decades, is expected to reduce the violence in the predominantly Muslim southern island of Mindanao.

headline.seo: Philippines and Rebel Group Take Step Toward Peace
headline.main: Philippine Rebel Group Agrees to Peace Accord to End Violence in South
headline.print_headline: Philippine Rebel Group Agrees to Peace Accord To End Violence in South

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
